title: P4 Support Main - Looking for Duo - Jungle / ADC only.

embed.description: Niege / Gold 1 2LP / 218W 208L Win Ratio 51% / Blitzcrank - 139W 102L Win Ratio 58%, Thresh - 58W 69L Win Ratio 46%, Hecarim - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Morgana - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Jarvan IV - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Hello everyone,

I recently hit Platinum in solo queue, looking at improving my game play and also playing with other people.  I currently hold a 58% win rate on Bliz, because that's fun. But I have a reasonable champion pool, please add me in game, 

Looking for people, of even elo, who main ADC or jungle, hit me up. I've included my IGN with OP.GG, I also stream on Twitch, so if you see me on. I'd love to see your support!

IGN: Niege
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/niege

Now next step, let's see if, I can push to Diamond!

<3
